Battera::

She didn't move. "I will not leave untill after I have spoken to your 
leader. However, I would apreciate it if you didn't judge me to be so 
bad untill you have had the oppertunity to get to know me first. I 
still don't think ill of you....yet." She kept her face the same, yet 
she was cursing her language programs. She had to work harder to keep 
them in line.
